member.summary: Specifies the type of clock to display in a FarPoint clock control.

member.summary: (0) Displays clock with the standard settings as specified in the Windows Control Panel

member.summary: Displays clock with LCD-type digits

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockStyle.Analog
member.summary: Displays clock as a traditional analog clock face with hour, minute, and second hands

member.name: T:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.AllowMoveHands
member.summary: Specifies the way that user interaction moves the clock hands in a FarPoint clock control.

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.AllowMoveHands.None
member.summary: (Default)Does not move the clock hands when the user clicks on them with the mouse

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.AllowMoveHands.LeftMouseButton
member.summary: Moves clock hands when the user clicks on them with the left mouse button down

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.AllowMoveHands.RightMouseButton
member.summary: Moves clock hands when the user clicks on them with the right mouse button down

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.AllowMoveHands.MiddleMouseButton
member.summary: Moves clock hands when the user clicks on them with the middle mouse button down

member.name: T:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockMode
member.summary: Specifies the type of mode to use in a FarPoint clock control.

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockMode.Regional
member.summary: (0) Uses the regional settings in the Windows Control Panel

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockMode.TwelveHour
member.summary: Calculates the time as a 12-hour clock

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockMode.TwentyFourHour
member.summary: Calculates the time as a 24-hour clock

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockMode.StopWatch
member.summary: Supports time from 0 to 99 hours

member.name: T:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockFace
member.summary: Specifies the number and type of numerals to display in an analog FarPoint clock control.

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockFace.NoNumbers
member.summary: (Default) Does not display numerals in the analog clock face

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockFace.AllArabic
member.summary: Displays the Arabic numerals 1,2,3,...,12 in the analog clock face

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockFace.Every3Arabic
member.summary: Displays the Arabic numerals 3,6,9,12 in the analog clock face

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockFace.AllRoman
member.summary: Displays the Roman numerals I,II,III,...,XII in the analog clock face

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockFace.Every3Roman
member.summary: Displays the Roman numerals III,VI,IX,XII in the analog clock face

member.name: T:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockHandShadow
member.summary: Specifies the direction of light cast (and thus how shadow appears) in an analog FarPoint clock control.

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockHandShadow.LowerRight
member.summary: Light source appears to come from the upper left; shadows display below and to the right of the clock hands

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockHandShadow.LowerLeft
member.summary: Light source appears to come from the upper right; shadows display below and to the left of the clock hands

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockHandShadow.UpperRight
member.summary: Light source appears to come from the lower right; shadows display above and to the left of the clock hands

member.name: F:FarPoint.PluginCalendar.WinForms.ClockHandShadow.UpperLeft
member.summary: Light source appears to come from the lower left; shadows display above and to the right of the clock hands

members.member:
The main class for the FpClock control, which lets the user display and manipulate time values.
Represents a FarPoint clock control that displays a customizable clock interface and allows time value selections.
